languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс взирает на вас, словно размышляя о чем-то. Наконец, решившись, он негромко произносит.{/n} "С завершением моей миссии я могу посвятить время иным вещам. Например, данному когда-то обещанию о беседе с Лорд-капитаном".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс взирает на вас, словно размышляя о чем-то. Наконец, решившись, он негромко произносит.{/n} "С завершением моей миссии я могу посвятить время иным вещам. Например, данному когда-то обещанию о беседе с Лорд-капитаном".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix's eyes are fixed on you as if he is pondering something. At last, having made a decision, he says quietly,{/n} "Now that my mission is concluded, I can devote my time to other things. Such as that long-promised conversation with the Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс взирает на вас, словно размышляя о чем-то. Наконец, решившись, он негромко произносит.{/n} "С завершением моей миссии я могу посвятить время иным вещам. Например, данному когда-то обещанию о беседе с Лорд-капитаном".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix's eyes are fixed on you as if he is pondering something. At last, having made a decision, he says quietly,{/n} "Now that my mission is concluded, I can devote my time to other things. Such as that long-promised conversation with the Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix's eyes are fixed on you as if he is pondering something. At last, having made a decision, he says quietly,{/n} "Now that my mission is concluded, I can devote my time to other things. Such as that long-promised conversation with the Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix's eyes are fixed on you as if he is pondering something. At last, having made a decision, he says quietly,{/n} "Now that my mission is concluded, I can devote my time to other things. Such as that long-promised conversation with the Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix's eyes are fixed on you as if he is pondering something. At last, having made a decision, he says quietly,{/n} "Now that my mission is concluded, I can devote my time to other things. Such as that long-promised conversation with the Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix te mira fijamente, como si estuviese sopesando algo. Finalmente se decide y habla con voz queda.{/n} «Ahora que mi misión ha concluido, puedo dedicar mi tiempo a otros menesteres. Como la conversación que le prometí hace mucho a mi Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's eyes are fixed on you as if he is pondering something. At last, having made a decision, he says quietly,{/n} "Now that my mission is concluded, I can devote my time to other things. Such as that long-promised conversation with the Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix te mira fijamente, como si estuviese sopesando algo. Finalmente se decide y habla con voz queda.{/n} «Ahora que mi misión ha concluido, puedo dedicar mi tiempo a otros menesteres. Como la conversación que le prometí hace mucho a mi Lord Capitán».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスの目は何かを思案するかのようにこちらを見つめている。そしてついに決断し、静かに口を開く。{/n}「任務は終了したので、今後俺は他のことに時間を使える。かねてから約束していたロード・キャプテンとの会話などにね」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's eyes are fixed on you as if he is pondering something. At last, having made a decision, he says quietly,{/n} "Now that my mission is concluded, I can devote my time to other things. Such as that long-promised conversation with the Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスの目は何かを思案するかのようにこちらを見つめている。そしてついに決断し、静かに口を開く。{/n}「任務は終了したので、今後俺は他のことに時間を使える。かねてから約束していたロード・キャプテンとの会話などにね」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希盯着你，似乎在思考什么。到了最后，他下定决心，低声说道，{/n}“如今我的任务已经结束了，可以把时间花在其他事情上了。比如说，与你进行一场约定已久的谈话，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's eyes are fixed on you as if he is pondering something. At last, having made a decision, he says quietly,{/n} "Now that my mission is concluded, I can devote my time to other things. Such as that long-promised conversation with the Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希盯着你，似乎在思考什么。到了最后，他下定决心，低声说道，{/n}“如今我的任务已经结束了，可以把时间花在其他事情上了。比如说，与你进行一场约定已久的谈话，舰长大人。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix vous fixe du regard, comme s'il réfléchissait à quelque chose. Puis, ayant pris une décision, il déclare à voix basse :{/n} « Maintenant que ma mission est achevée, je vais pouvoir me consacrer à d'autres tâches. Comme cette conversation promise de longue date {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's eyes are fixed on you as if he is pondering something. At last, having made a decision, he says quietly,{/n} "Now that my mission is concluded, I can devote my time to other things. Such as that long-promised conversation with the Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix vous fixe du regard, comme s'il réfléchissait à quelque chose. Puis, ayant pris une décision, il déclare à voix basse :{/n} « Maintenant que ma mission est achevée, je vais pouvoir me consacrer à d'autres tâches. Comme cette conversation promise de longue date {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine}. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix' Augen sind ganz auf dich fixiert, als würde er über etwas nachdenken. Schließlich trifft er eine Entscheidung und sagt leise:{/n} "Da meine Mission jetzt abgeschlossen ist, kann ich meine Zeit anderen Dingen widmen. Beispielsweise der seit langem versprochenen Unterhaltung mit dem Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's eyes are fixed on you as if he is pondering something. At last, having made a decision, he says quietly,{/n} "Now that my mission is concluded, I can devote my time to other things. Such as that long-promised conversation with the Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix' Augen sind ganz auf dich fixiert, als würde er über etwas nachdenken. Schließlich trifft er eine Entscheidung und sagt leise:{/n} "Da meine Mission jetzt abgeschlossen ist, kann ich meine Zeit anderen Dingen widmen. Beispielsweise der seit langem versprochenen Unterhaltung mit dem Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's eyes are fixed on you as if he is pondering something. At last, having made a decision, he says quietly,{/n} "Now that my mission is concluded, I can devote my time to other things. Such as that long-promised conversation with the Lord Captain."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, gözlerini sana dikip bir şey düşünüyormuşçasına bakıyor. Sonunda bir karara varıp sessizce konuşuyor.{/n} "Artık görevim sona erdiğine göre vaktimi başka işlere harcayabilirim. Lord Kaptan'la ne zamandır ertelediğimiz sohbetimize mesela."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's eyes are fixed on you as if he is pondering something. At last, having made a decision, he says quietly,{/n} "Now that my mission is concluded, I can devote my time to other things. Such as that long-promised conversation with the Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix, gözlerini sana dikip bir şey düşünürmüşçesine bakıyor. Sonunda bir karara varıp sessizce konuşuyor.{/n} "Artık görevim sona erdiğine göre vaktimi başka işlere harcayabilirim. Lord Kaptan'la ne zamandır ertelediğimiz sohbetimiz mesela."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
